comment.author: 30559980@N07
comment._content: The house with the tower in the right side of this photo is a former territorial governor's mansion. When I attended KU I lived directly across Tennessee Street in the 1600 block. My view was the front of this stately mansion. At the time, it was owned by the owners of the MaupinTour travel agency and was meticulously maintained and landscaped. Here's what it looked like in about 1976: www.flickr.com/photos/30559980@N07/9649091821/
